titles.title: Private Mortgage Insurance Cancellation Simplification Act of 1998
To amend the Homeowners Protection Act of 1998 to increase consumer protections relating to cancellation of private mortgage insurance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 8/6/1998--Introduced. Private Mortgage Insurance Cancellation Simplification Act of 1998 - Amends the Homeowners Protection Act of 1998 to apply the borrower termination and automatic cancellation provisions to high-risk loans. Provides that, other than with respect to inconsistencies, such Act does not affect compliance with State laws regarding private residential mortgage insurance.
